S04bsu029_u:354: yujyadhva nityaṃ sada bodhimārge mā tapsyathā durgatiṣūpapannāḥ // 90 //
S04bsu029_u:355: bahukalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:356: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyaja pramādaṃ yadi mokṣakāmaḥ // 91 //
S04bsu029_u:357: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:359: pāpamitraṃ rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:360: upalambhadṛṣṭiko rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:361: saddharmapratikṣepakaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:362: āmiṣalolupaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:363: ime rāṣṭrapāla catvāraḥ pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ //
S04bsu029_u:364: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:365: ye pāpamitrāṇi vivarjayanti kalpāṇamitrāṇi sadā bhajanti /
S04bsu029_u:366: vardhanti te bodhipatheṣu nityaṃ yatha śuklapakṣe divi candramaṇḍalam // 92 //
S04bsu029_u:367: upalambhadṛṣṭyāṃ ca sadā niviṣṭā ātme niviṣṭāstatha jīvapoṣe /
S04bsu029_u:368: viṣakumbhavatte sada varjayanti ye buddhajñānena bhavanti arthikāḥ // 93 //
S04bsu029_u:369: kṣipanti ye dharma narottamānāṃ śāntaṃ virāgamamṛtānukūlam /
S04bsu029_u:370: tān varjayenmīḍhaghaṭāṃ yathaiva ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 94 //
S04bsu029_u:371: adhyoṣitā āmiṣa pātracīvare kulasaṃstave caiva sadābhiyuktāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:372: kurvīta sārdhaṃ na hi teṣu saṃstavaṃ tān varjayedagnikhadhāṃ (khadāṃ) yathaiva // 95 //
S04bsu029_u:373: yasyepsitaṃ dharṣayituṃ hi māraṃ pravartituṃ cakravaraṃ hyanuttaram /
S04bsu029_u:374: sattvārthamevaṃ vipulaṃ ca kartuṃ varjyāśca tenāpi ca pāpamitrāḥ // 96 //
S04bsu029_u:375: vivarjayitvā ca priyāpriyāṇi lābhaṃ yaśo bhaṇḍanamānamīrṣyām /
S04bsu029_u:376: eṣeta nityaṃ sada buddhajñānaṃ ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 97 //
S04bsu029_u:378: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ duḥkhavipākā dharmāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:385: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:386: dharmadharā bhuvi ye tu bhavanti pūjita sarvajageṣu bhavanti /
S04bsu029_u:389: viṣameṇa sa deśati bhogen chandaruciḥ sada jñāni aśuddhe /
S04bsu029_u:390: mānonnata yaśca hi nityaṃ namate guruāryajaneṣu // 99 //
S04bsu029_u:391: adhimukti na vidyati buddhe dharmagaṇe ca na tasyadhimuktiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:393: sa itaścyuto hi manujeṣu karmavaśādabudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:394: narakeṣvatha tiryaggatiṣu pretagatiṣu ca vandati duḥkham / 101 //
S04bsu029_u:396: tena apāyapathaṃ pravihāya bodhipathaḥ satataṃ hi niṣevyaḥ // 102 //
S04bsu029_u:401: anigṛhītacittasya jñānavirahitasya pramādasevanatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvasya bandhanam /
S04bsu029_u:404: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:405: avamanyati nitya parasya bhāvayate sada laukikadhyānam /
S04bsu029_u:406: badhyati tebhi sa dṛṣṭiśatebhiḥ paṅki gajo yatha durbalakāyaḥ // 103 //
S04bsu029_u:410: so avamanyana manyana tyaktvā yujyati bodhipathe satataṃ ca // 105 //
S04bsu029_u:412: tyaktva priyāpriyajñātramaśeṣaṃ buddha bhavanti vikalmaṣa dhīrāḥ // 106 //
S04bsu029_u:416: kalpa acintiya pūrva carantaḥ sattvahitāya caran varabodhau /
S04bsu029_u:417: dānadame niyame 'pi ca nityaṃ susthita āsi tyajitva ca jñātīn // 108 //
S04bsu029_u:418: prāntavane sada nitya rato 'haṃ śoṣita āśrayu bodhinidānam /
S04bsu029_u:419: na ca saṃsṛtu vīryaṃ kadācideṣata jñāna mahāpuruṣāṇām // 109 //
S04bsu029_u:421: kṛtva kṛpāṃ vipulāmiha pūrve ārjita bodhi balājjagadarthe // 110 //
S04bsu029_u:422: duhitṛsvasutāḥ priyabhāryāḥ tyakta purā dhanadhānya prabhūtāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:423: jīvita iṣṭa mahī susamṛddhā eṣata bodhivarāṃ bahukalpān // 111 //
S04bsu029_u:424: phalapuṣpajalāḍhya suramya āsi vane muni kṣāntirato 'ham /
S04bsu029_u:425: chinna karau caraṇau kalirājñā naiva mano 'pi tadā mama duṣṭam // 112 //
S04bsu029_u:426: vanakandari śyāmaku nāma āsi munirbharato gurujīrṇo /
S04bsu029_u:429: kāye na ca me na ca jīve bodhinimittamavekṣya babhūva // 114 //
S04bsu029_u:433: śoṣitu ratnanidāna samudraḥ prāpya maṇiṃ sukhitāḥ kṛta sattvāḥ // 116 //
S04bsu029_u:436: duḥkhita vīkṣya naraṃ ca daridraṃ tyakta mayā priyameva śarīram /
S04bsu029_u:437: prāpya dhanaṃ sa kṛtaśca mayāḍhyaḥ sarvadadena nṛpeṇa satā me // 118 //
S04bsu029_u:438: śaraṇāgata vīkṣya kapotaṃ svaṃ piśitaṃ vinikṛtya śarīrāt /
S04bsu029_u:439: dattamapi svatanurna bhayārtastyakta ihāpi nṛpeṇa satā me // 119 //
S04bsu029_u:441: jīvita tyajya parasya dadau taṃ kesarirāja babhūva yadāham // 120 //
S04bsu029_u:443: caratā ca purā jagadarthe madri pativrata tyakta saputrā /
S04bsu029_u:446: uttaptavīryu yada āsīt arthadhanaśriyo 'pi ca purā me // 122 //
S04bsu029_u:448: pūjā kṛtā daśabalānām āsi nṛpātmaji vimalatejāḥ // 123 //
S04bsu029_u:449: raudrākṣa eva ca ruṣitvā yācitavān sa cāpi mama śīrṣam /
S04bsu029_u:450: dattaṃ nikṛtya ca mayā tad rāja yadā ca candraprabha āsīt // 124 //
S04bsu029_u:452: sattvārtha sthāpit mayā te puṇyasamo babhūva ca yadāham // 125 //
S04bsu029_u:454: tyaktāṃ pūrvabhaveṣu caratā me āsi yadā śubho nṛpati pūrve // 126 //
S04bsu029_u:456: tyaktaśca me makuṭa pūrva āsi nṛpo yadā ratanacūḍaḥ // 127 //
S04bsu029_u:458: tyaktau karau sacaraṇau me pūrva nṛpeṇa dhṛtimatā ca // 128 //
S04bsu029_u:460: kṛta mānuṣā badaradvīpe siṃhala sārthavāha yada āsīt // 129 //
S04bsu029_u:461: kāmeṣu mṛrcchitamanā me bāli sa rākṣasī pramadasaṃjñā /
S04bsu029_u:462: pañcaśatāni vaṇijānāṃ mokṣita te yadā bhave sunetraḥ // 130 //
S04bsu029_u:464: pravrajya nirgatu jinasya śāsane puṇyaraśmi yada āsīt // 131 //
S04bsu029_u:465: mayi tyaktamaṅguli udārā sattvahitārthameva caratā me /
S04bsu029_u:466: jālārcitā vimalaśuddhā kāñcanavarṇa pārthiva yada āsīt // 132 //
S04bsu029_u:468: tyaktā mayā ca jagadarthe utpalanetre pārthiva yadāsīt // 133 //
S04bsu029_u:470: parimocitā karuṇayā me keśava vaidyarāja yada āsīt // 134 //
S04bsu029_u:471: vyādhyāturaṃ ca naramīkṣya svaṃ rudhiraṃ pradattamapi me 'bhūt /
S04bsu029_u:472: nirvyādhitaḥ sa ca kṛto me prāgbhava sarvadarśi yadabhūvam // 135 //
S04bsu029_u:474: hitvā svamasthi ca śarīrād vyādhikṛśasya majja mayā dattam /
S04bsu029_u:475: na ca sattva tyakta maya jātu āsi nṛpo yadā kusuma nāma // 136 //
S04bsu029_u:476: sarvasvakośamapi tyaktva jīvita tyakta me priya manāpam /
S04bsu029_u:477: naru mokṣito vyasanaprāpta āsi nṛpo 'rthasiddhi yada pūrvam // 137 //
S04bsu029_u:479: nṛpa āśuketu yada āsīd bodhimabhīpsamāna jagadarthe // 138 //
S04bsu029_u:480: nṛpa sarvadarśi yada āsīt kāruṇiko janārthahitakāmaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:481: tyaktā mayā caturo 'pi ca dvīpāḥ sphītanarairvranarīśataiśca // 139 //
S04bsu029_u:482: mṛdu komalaṃ vikalagauraṃ ūru tacchittva hṝṣṭamuditāyā /
S04bsu029_u:483: dattaṃ svamāṃsa rudhiraṃ me jñānavatī yadāsi nṛpaputrī // 140 //
S04bsu029_u:485: strī prekṣya me kṣudhatṛṣārtaṃ sā rūpya (pa ?)
S04bsu029_u:489: rājñaḥ suto tu vikṛtajñaḥ tārita sāgarādyada kṛtajñaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:490: ratnārtha netra mama tena uddhṛta naiva me ruṣita cittam // 143 //
S04bsu029_u:491: mā bhūtpipīlikavadho me tyakta varāśrayo 'pi canapekṣya /
S04bsu029_u:492: na ca citta kampita tadā me tyakta pūrvabhaveṣu godha yada āsīt // 144 //
S04bsu029_u:494: na ca mānavānapi ca stabdha āsi kapiṃjalo vicaramāṇaḥ // 145 //
S04bsu029_u:495: śaraṇāgatasya ca mayārthe tyakta samucchrayaḥ kṛpa janitvā /
S04bsu029_u:496: na ca tyakta vānaragatena vyādhanaraḥ śarābhinihatena // 146 //
S04bsu029_u:497: gajavaśagatena śoṣito me tanurapi vṛddhaguruṃ jagatsmaritvā /
S04bsu029_u:498: suruciramaśanaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ mokṣita ātma gajā yadā tadāsīt // 147 //
S04bsu029_u:499: ṛkṣapatirabhūva śailadurge himahata sapta dināni rakṣito me /
S04bsu029_u:500: puruṣa vadhaku tena me prayukto na ca pratighāta kṛtaśca me tadāsmin // 148 //
S04bsu029_u:502: sa viṣeṇa śareṇa ca viddho daṃṣṭravarāṃstyajamāna na dviṣṭaḥ // 149 //
S04bsu029_u:507: gaṅgataraṅgajalairhiyamāṇaḥ tārita me yada āsi mṛgatve /
S04bsu029_u:508: vadhakā mama tenapanītā naiva mano mama tatra praduṣṭam // 151 //
S04bsu029_u:510: taiśca hataḥ kṣudhitaiśca tadāhaṃ kacchapayonigato 'pi ca maitraḥ // 152 //
S04bsu029_u:511: bodhicariṃ caramāṇahu pūrvaṃ matsya babhūva yadā jalacarī /
S04bsu029_u:514: sattva kṛtāḥ sukhitā nirujāśca prāṇaku saumya tadā ca yadāsīt // 154 //
S04bsu029_u:515: siṃha babhūva yadā mṛgarājā sthāmabalānvita kāruṇikaśca /
S04bsu029_u:516: viddha śareṇa na dūṣita cittaṃ maitri tadā vadhake 'pi tadā me // 155 //
S04bsu029_u:517: śaṅkhatuṣāranibho hayarājā āsi purā ca samudrataṭe 'ham /
S04bsu029_u:518: rākṣasimadhyagatā vaṇijo me tārita kṛtva kṛpāṃ karuṇāṃ ca // 156 //
S04bsu029_u:519: bodhicariṃ caramāṇa janārthe āsi kuṇāla ahaṃ yada pakṣī /
S04bsu029_u:520: varjita kāmaguṇā bahudoṣā no ca vaśaṃ pramadāna gato 'ham // 157 //
S04bsu029_u:521: āsi śaśo vanagulmanivāsī śāsatī taṃ sukṛte śaśavargam /
S04bsu029_u:523: āsi śuko drumapuṣpaphalāḍhyo śuṣkadrumo na ca me sa hi tyaktaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:524: dṛṣṭa kṛtajña tadā mama śakrastaṃ kṛtavāṃstaru patraphalāḍhyam // 159 //
S04bsu029_u:526: rājabhayāttu vimokṣita te me vānararāja ahaṃ yada āsīt // 160 //
S04bsu029_u:527: śuka bhūta purā guruhetoḥ śāli haraṃśca nareṇa gṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:528: kiṃ nu śukā harase mama śāli nāśayate 'pi ca pakṣi maśasyam ( matsasyam) // 161 //
S04bsu029_u:529: śuka so 'bravīdbhadra śṛṇuṣva caurya harāmi na te ahu śālim /
S04bsu029_u:530: jīrṇagurudvayapoṣaṇahetoḥ śāli harāmi kṛpārtha tu teṣām // 162 //
S04bsu029_u:532: bīja prakīrṇa yadā prathamaṃ te bhāga dadāmi sarvajanasya /
S04bsu029_u:533: tacca giraṃ vadato mama śrutvā tenāpi caurya bhavenna kadācit // 163 //
S04bsu029_u:534: sādhu śukā hara śāli yatheṣṭaṃ durlabha mānuṣa yasyimu bhaktiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:535: mānuṣa tvaṃ maya tīryagatehā sādhu damaḥ śama saṃyama tubhyam // 164 //
S04bsu029_u:536: ityevamāni caritāni pūrva caranta duṣkara kṛtāni /
S04bsu029_u:537: na ca me manasi tatra bhavi kheda eṣata uttamāṃ viraja bodhim // 165 //
S04bsu029_u:538: ādhyātmikaṃ hyatha ca bāhyaṃ nāsti hi vastu yanmayā na dattam /
S04bsu029_u:539: śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya dhyāna upāya prajña carito 'ham // 166 //
S04bsu029_u:540: māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ tathapi ca majja śoṇitameva datta svaśarīrāt /
S04bsu029_u:541: prānte guhāsu ca yadā me śoṣita āśrayo 'pi caratā me // 167 //
S04bsu029_u:542: dhutayāna deśita jinebhiḥ yatra prayujyato jina bhavanti /
S04bsu029_u:543: tatra dhute satataṃ ca prayukto āsi caranta pure ahu nityam // 168 //
S04bsu029_u:544: etādṛśā vrata udārā ye ca niṣevitā caratā me /
S04bsu029_u:545: śrutvā ca teṣamimāścaryamekapade na bhaviṣyati chandaḥ // 169 //
S04bsu029_u:546: hāsyu bhaviṣyati ima śruṇitvā śāsanametadeva ca taḍānīm /
S04bsu029_u:549: śrutvā ca dharmamima śāntaṃ naiṣa jinokta ityabhivadanti // 171 //
S04bsu029_u:550: ācāryo me śrutasamudro āsi bahuśrutaḥ kathikaśreṣṭhaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:551: tenāpi caiṣa pratiṣiddho buddhavaco hi naiṣa tu kathaṃcit // 172 //
S04bsu029_u:552: parato 'pyabhūdapi ca vṛddhaḥ tasya guruḥ sa śāmitaguṇaughaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:553: tenāpi naiṣa hi gṛhīto mātra prayujyatha vitathametat // 173 //
S04bsu029_u:554: yatrātma nāsti na ca jīvo deśita pudgalo 'pi na kathaṃcit /
S04bsu029_u:555: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra ghaṭate yaḥ śīlaprayoga saṃvarakriyā ca // 174 //
S04bsu029_u:556: yadyasti caiva mahāyānaṃ nātra hi ātma sattva manujo vā /
S04bsu029_u:557: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra hi kṛto me yatra na cātmasattvaupalabdhiḥ // 175 //
S04bsu029_u:559: bhāṣeta no jina kadācit vācamimāṃ hi bhikṣuparibhāṣām // 176 //
S04bsu029_u:561: bhavitā hi bhikṣava mameha śāsani īrṣyamānamadadagdhāḥ // 177 //
S04bsu029_u:565: buddhasya te dhvaja gṛhītvā sevakarā gṛhasthajanatāyām /
S04bsu029_u:566: lekhaṃ vahanti satataṃ te śāsanadaṃ vihāya guṇarāśim /
S04bsu029_u:570: naiṣāmanāryamapi vācyaṃ naiva ca kiṃcidasti yadakāryam /
S04bsu029_u:571: staupika sāṃghikaṃ hyapi ca vittaṃ paugdalikaṃ ca yacca samameṣām // 181 //
S04bsu029_u:572: bhikṣuṇa vīkṣya ca guṇāḍhyaṃ teṣvapi cāpyavarṇa kathayanti /
S04bsu029_u:573: duḥśīla vañcaka praviśya kuhāste strī ca vināśayanti hi sughorāḥ //182 //
S04bsu029_u:574: gṛddho gṛhīṇa tathā kāmairyādṛśe pravrajitva te gṛddhāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:575: bhāryāṃ sutā duhitaraśca teṣu bhaviṣya gṛhisamānam // 183 //
S04bsu029_u:578: kāmā ime khalu na sevyāḥ pātana tiryakpretanirayeṣu /
S04bsu029_u:579: vakṣyanti te sada gṛhīṇāṃ te ca svayamadānta anupaśāntāḥ // 185 //
S04bsu029_u:580: svayameva te yatha adāntāḥ śiṣyagaṇo 'pi teṣa na sudāntaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:582: sevārthameva na guṇārthaṃ te khalu saṃgrahaṃ dadati teṣām /
S04bsu029_u:583: śiṣyagaṇaiḥ svakaiḥ parivṛto 'haṃ pūja jane sadātra cala sidhya // 187 //
S04bsu029_u:584: kathayanti te 'pi ca janasya saṃgraha eṣa me karuṇayaiṣām /
S04bsu029_u:585: upasthāma prārthayāmi tebhya śiṣyagaṇebhya eva na kadācit // 188 //
S04bsu029_u:587: pravrajiṣyanti narakeṣu āgatā āgatā sada anāryāḥ // 189 //
S04bsu029_u:589: gṛhiṇo na te 'pi vna ca bhikṣū varjita te yathā śmaśāna iva dāruḥ // 190 //
S04bsu029_u:590: śikṣāsu cādara na teṣāṃ syānna ca prātimokṣavinaye vā /
S04bsu029_u:592: vanavāsināmapi hi teṣāṃ grāmagataṃ bhaviṣyati hi cittam /
S04bsu029_u:593: kleśāgninā prapatitānāṃ cittamavasthitaṃ hi na ca teṣām // 192 //
S04bsu029_u:594: vismṛtya buddhaguṇa sarvān śikṣadhutāṃśca te 'pi ca upāyāna /
S04bsu029_u:599: dhyānaṃ tathādhyayanaṃ tyaktvā nitya vihārakarmaṇi niyuktāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:601: na ca karmiko hyahaṃ vihāre ātmana hetureṣa hi kṛto me /
S04bsu029_u:604: damasaṃyame satatayuktāḥ saṃgraha teṣu te na kurute ca // 197 //
S04bsu029_u:606: saṃmodikasya ca mamedaṃ gaccha na te 'sti vāsa iha kaścit // 198 //
S04bsu029_u:607: śayyāsanaṃ nikhila dattaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpitā iha prabhūtāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:608: na ca lābhasaṃbhava ihāsti kiṃ paribhokṣyase 'tra vraja bhikṣo // 199 //
S04bsu029_u:609: śayyāsanoddiśana teṣāṃ naiva bhaviṣyate 'pi ca kadācit /
S04bsu029_u:611: nirbhartsitā pi ca samantātte hi mamaurasāścarimakāle /
S04bsu029_u:612: vacanaṃ na caite mam hi smṛtvā prāntavane tadābhinivasanti // 201 //
S04bsu029_u:613: hā śāsanaṃ jinavarasya nāśamupekṣya hi nacireṇa /
S04bsu029_u:614: lābhābhibhūta guṇadviṣṭā bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūta bahu yatra // 202 //
S04bsu029_u:617: sada satkṛtā guṇavihīnā bhedaka sūcakāḥ kalahakāmāḥ /

S04bsu029_u:1132: yaṣṭā yajñaśatā acintiyāparimāṇā kāyastena tavābhirājate abhirūpaḥ // 331 //
S04bsu029_u:1133: dānaśīlasamādhiprajñayāpi ca kṣāntyā vīryadhyānamupāyaśodhitaṃ tava rūpam /
S04bsu029_u:1134: candrārkamaṇidyutiprabhā na virāji śakrabramhaprabhā na bhāsate purataste // 332 //
S04bsu029_u:1135: rūpaṃ darśayate manoramaṃ jagadarthe pratibhāsodakacandrasaṃnibhaṃ yatha māyā /
S04bsu029_u:1136: sarvāsveva ca dikṣu dṛśyate jinakāyo no cā rūpapramāṇu dṛśyate sugatānām // 333 //
S04bsu029_u:1137: tuṣiteṣu kvacideva dṛśyase nivasaṃstvaṃ vyūḍhamānaśca punaḥ supāṇḍaragajabhūtaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1138: mātu kukṣigataśca dṛśyase 'pi ca vīraḥ sarvatrānugato mahāmune nabhatulyaḥ // 334 //
S04bsu029_u:1139: jātiṃ saṃdarśayase kvacidbhavān diśatāsu gacchan sapta padāni dṛśyase kvacidurvyām /
S04bsu029_u:1140: hyeṣṭho 'haṃ sanarāmare jage atidevo mociṣye jaga duḥkhasāgarādgira muñcan // 335 //
S04bsu029_u:1141: dharmasaṃśayu nāsti te mune kvacideva śikṣāṃ cāpi ca loka dṛśyate lipijñāne śāntaṃ dhyānasamādhigocaramanuprāptaṃ strīṇāṃ madhyagataśca dṛśyate kvacideva // 336 //
S04bsu029_u:1142: tyaktvā mātāpitā mahītale pramadāśca jñātīn śokahatān vimūrcchitān viruvantaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1143: niṣkrānto vanavāsamīkṣyase padamekaṃ devākoṭiśataiḥ parivṛto varasattvaḥ // 337 //
S04bsu029_u:1144: mārāste caturo 'pi nirjitāścirakālaṃ mārān dharṣayamāṇa dṛśyate 'pi ca kṣetre /
S04bsu029_u:1145: cakraṃ vartayase 'pyacintiyaṃ purimeṇa cakraṃ vartayamāna dṛśyase kṛpayā tvam // 338 //
S04bsu029_u:1147: nityaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭisaṃjñitaṃ jagadīkṣya nirvāsya iti vāca bhāṣase pariṣatsu /
S04bsu029_u:1148: saṃsārābhirataṃ jagatsatatamīkṣya śāntāṃ śītagatiṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ vadasi tvam // 339 //
S04bsu029_u:1149: puṇyajñānamupāyaprajñato na samaste sphurase kāyaprabhāya tvaṃ mune bahukṣetrān /
S04bsu029_u:1150: bhāṣante tava varṇa nāyakā diśatāsu vande tvāmasamantagocaraṃ munirājam // 340 //
S04bsu029_u:1151: vandāmo 'pi ca dharmatāmakhilaprāptaṃ sarvasattvakriyāsu dṛśyase yatha māyā /
S04bsu029_u:1152: na ca te 'styāgamanaṃ kvacidgamanaṃ vā māyādharma sati pratiṣṭhitamabhivande // 341 //
S04bsu029_u:1153: sādhu tvaṃ naravīra bhāṣase varamārgaṃ bodhiryena varā hyavāpyate jagadarthe /
S04bsu029_u:1154: etāmapyahamāśu dharmatāmanubuddhā deśeyaṃ naravīraṃ dhamatāṃ jagadarthe // 342 //
S04bsu029_u:1155: sarvajñaṃ vigatajvaraṃ naravīraṃ yasya nāsti samaḥ kuto 'dhikastribhave 'smin /
S04bsu029_u:1156: stutvā puṇyamupārjitaṃ mayā yadiha tena śāntāṃ bodhivarāmanuttarāṃ spṛśatu lokaḥ // 343 //
S04bsu029_u:1157: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla sa tathāgataḥ siddhārthabuddhiḥ rājño 'rciṣmato 'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa yathā sarve avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S04bsu029_u:1158: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ siddhārthabuddhiṃ tathāgatametadavocat - adhivāsayatu bhagavānasmākāṃ nagare śvobhaktena /
S04bsu029_u:1159: adhivāsayati ca bhagavān puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya tūṣṇībhāvenānukampāmupādāya //
S04bsu029_u:1160: atha khalu puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastau mātāpitarau tāśva pramadā āmantrayati sma - anumodayantu bhavantaḥ sarve sahitāḥ sarve samagrāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1163: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro yathālaṃkṛtaṃ ratipradhānaṃ nagaraṃ tathāgatāya niryātayati sma anapekṣaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1164: pañcarasaśatavyūhena ca bhojanena taṃ tathāgataṃ pratipādayati sma sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
S04bsu029_u:1165: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saptaratnacitān vihārān kārayāmāsa maṇicaṃkramān prajñaptānupari ca ratnajālavitānavitatān vāmadakṣiṇena puṣpavṛkṣasupariniṣṭhitān /
S04bsu029_u:1168: ekaikasya ca bhikṣorabhivandya cīvaro dīyate sma ekaikaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1174: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ na rājyatṛṣṇām /
S04bsu029_u:1178: na ca dvirapi sa tathāgataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1179: etasminnantare na snāto na sarpitailena vā gātraṃ mrakṣitam,
S04bsu029_u:1183: yasmiṃśca samaye sa tathāgataḥ parinirvṛtastasmin samaye lohitacandranasya citā kāritā /
S04bsu029_u:1184: yatra sa tathāgato dhmāpitastasminneva ca pṛthivipradeśe varṣaśatasahasraṃ dhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu029_u:1185: sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvavādyairyāvat sarvapūjāsatkārān kṛtvā pañcāccaturnavatiḥ stūpakoṭyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitavān /
S04bsu029_u:1186: te ca stūpāḥ saptaratnamayā ratnajālasaṃchannā muktājālavitānavitatāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1187: saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ pañca pañca chatraśatānyekaikasmin stūpe āropitavān /
S04bsu029_u:1192: anenopāyena varṣakoṭiṃ pūjāṃ kṝtvāḥ tataḥ pravrajitaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1197: tena nirāmiṣacittena catako varṣakoṭyo dharmadānaṃ dattam /
S04bsu029_u:1203: tasya cānuśikṣitvā sarvajanapado 'ntaḥpuraṃ sarvapādamūlaṃ sarvasahāyāśca pravrajitāḥ //
S04bsu029_u:1204: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla śūddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - puṇyaraśmeranuśikṣamāṇaḥ sarvarājyajanakadaḥ pravrajitaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1208: sarvasya puṇyaraśminā bhikṣuṇā buddhasahasrasya caivaṃrūpā pūjā kṛtābhūt //
S04bsu029_u:1209: syātkhalu punaste rāṣṭrapāla etarhi kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenārciṣmān nāma rājābhūt /
S04bsu029_u:1212: amitāyuḥ sa tathāgatastena kālena tena samayenārciṣmānnāma rājābhūt /
S04bsu029_u:1213: syātkhalu punaste rāṣṭrapāla - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṇyaraśmirnāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
S04bsu029_u:1216: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṇyaraśmirnāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
S04bsu029_u:1220: tatte 'nabhiyuktā lābhasatkāraślokagurukā jñātyadhyavasitā mānahatā lābhahatāstapasvino vihanyante,
S04bsu029_u:1222_0: nirarthakaṃ pravrajitāḥ śramaṇadūṣakā bodhisattvakhaṭukāḥ kāyavākcittavaṅkāḥ naimittikāḥ
S04bsu029_u:1223: ahrīkā anapatrapā acāritrā asaddharmaprasṛtā gocaravirahitā buddhagocarāddūrībhūtā buddhajñānavirahitāḥ mokṣacittavirahitāḥ bodhicittavirahitāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1224: tasmāttarhi rāṣṭrapāla imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā boddhavyam - pāpamitrānyudyuktāni na sevitavyāni lābhārthikānām //
S04bsu029_u:1225: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:1227: hitvā bodhiṃ guṇaśatanicitāṃ lābhārthaṃ te parakulanicatāḥ // 344 //
S04bsu029_u:1228: dhvāṅkṣā duṣṭā hrīdhṛtirahitā kṣetrārthaṃ te namucivaśagatāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1230: kāyo 'raṇye smṛtirapi nagare lābhārthaṃ te caritavikalpe /
S04bsu029_u:1231: dūre mokṣo nabha iva dharaṇi dūre jāhu bhujagavadetān // 346 //
S04bsu029_u:1232: buddho dharmo na ca priyavadatāṃ tadvatsaṃgho guṇaśatabharitaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1234: śrutvaināṃ mama cārikāṃ samupadiṣṭāṃ bhūtādhyāśayato 'tra yujyathā pratipattyā /
S04bsu029_u:1236: yo hīcchedvarabodhi budhyituṃ varayāne smāryāstena mahīpate guṇāstasya /
S04bsu029_u:1237: saṃcintya yathābhūta yoniśaḥ sthātavyamevaṃ bodhi asaṅga ridhyate sugatānām // 349 //
S04bsu029_u:1238: āryaṃ vaṃśaṃ niṣevate guṇaprekṣī jñānaṃ tatra utpādayecchu ivātra /
S04bsu029_u:1239: mā evaṃ pravijahya śāsanaṃ guṇamaṇḍaṃ sarvāsvetagatīṣu pañcasū yatha bālāḥ // 350 //
S04bsu029_u:1241: śailāraṇyaguhānijāsino bhavateha tatrasthāśca ma ātma manyathā paṭapaṃsī /
S04bsu029_u:1242: ātmānaṃ paribhāṣathā satatanitya - manusmaranto buddhakoṭi virāgitā purimā ye // 351 //
S04bsu029_u:1243: kāye jīvita tṛṣṇa utsṛha anapekṣā dharme yujyata tīvra gauravaṃ janayitvā /
S04bsu029_u:1244: pratipattiśca mayāpi bhāṣitā iha sūtre paścā bodhi na teṣu durlabhā iha sthitvā // 352 //
S04bsu029_u:1245: ye yuktāśca ihāpi harṣitā jinayāne śrutvā yukta sudurmanā bhavitāraḥ /
S04bsu029_u:1246: tasmādvai janayeta śāsane adhimuktiṃ mā paścādanutāpa bheṣyathā vicaramāṇāḥ // 353 //
S04bsu029_u:1247: yaśca punā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvaḥ pañcapāramitāsu caret,
S04bsu029_u:1248: yaśceha dharmaparyāyapratipatyā saṃpādayet - ahamatra śikṣiṣye 'hamatra saṃvare sthāsyāmi /
S04bsu029_u:1249: eṣa puṇyaskandho 'sya puṇyaskandhasya purataḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamāmapi śatasahasratamāmapi koṭiśatasahasratamāmapi,
S04bsu029_u:1250: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi dhṛtipadamapi nopaiti /
S04bsu029_u:1251: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāsyamāṇe triṃśatāṃ niyutānāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāśca prajāyā anutpadantapūrvāṇyanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni /
S04bsu029_u:1254: atha khalu āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālo bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S04bsu029_u:1256: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ rāṣṭrapālametadavocat - amoghapratijñāviśuddhamiti nāma dhāraya /
S04bsu029_u:1260: āttamanā āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
